name: Time's Miracle
desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemy targets with a high chance of Freezing them for 1 turn(s). After being attacked by memosprite while under this Freeze effect, additionally take True DMG equal to 8% of Max HP. Every time the enemy target is afflicted with this Freeze state, this DMG can be triggered a maximum of 4 time(s).
